Author: Acura#2748
Content: A friend is asking if there is an apk file for download ? he don¬¥t want to register for privacy reasons

Author: cipi#4502
Content:
possible solution  for staying private with google
1. use https://www.torproject.org/download/ to access google.com
2. create a new account
3. if asked for phone verification use this service https://onlinesim.ru/en
4. use your new google account on a phone without inserted sim card (wlan, preferably not your own)
5. install https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.torproject.android on your phone and make all apps use it

Author: Acura#2748
Content: Ok thanks Cipi

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: @ca333 I don't know Dart, so can you please update the existing language file with multiple objects which gives me the structure to add this extra language to the file? for now I just made the copy of the existing file and started the hindi translation.

Content: Once there is an extra object to add more languages, I can probably make a readme file with instructions to help others to start contributing.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: or may be if you can just start importing the other files in this language file, then that will also work. I think this will be better option than adding the extra objects to existing file.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: if you can fix code or this file being imported in existing used language file it'd be easier to start contributing.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: nice start.  i made a spreadsheet to help with translation but clearly these extended character sets need to be done directly to src code instead of c+p

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I just use the google input tools to type in English and that types that in Hindi for me. I just check the spellings are correct and the phrase I wrote makes sense to the context it is being used in the translated  file.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: just using the translate service will do the poor job. has to be typed at many times or at least fixed the errors in translated text.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: the ideal way to let other users to add the translations would be just sharing the translated files like I did. If people knows github they can add those files there or they can maybe just share with the existing staff, and they can push those to GitHub.

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: I have a question to the lucky ones

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: Is it possible to send eth to the atomicDEX or do I need to have some kmd?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: You can send ETH, fees paid in the trading currency, you are not forced to pay in KMD

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: Do i have a discount if i use kmd to pay fees?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Yes

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: But if you want ETH/BTC you cant pay in KMD to get it cheaper

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Would need ETH/KMD

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: ok cool

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: Do we have any release date?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: I think there might be something later that could do something like BNB but for now ???/KMD will give you the discount

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: I am not too sure when the official release would be. It is "live" now. Just be careful about it because i dont think you can set market orders yet. You just take what is available

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So if someone lists something for 5% lower than market rate you would get 5% lower than a CEX

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: I think everyone is waiting for the desktop wallets, then we will see a bit more liquidity come in.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: There are multiple teams trying to get the desktop version of it out üòõ

Author: luca_skywalker#0887
Content: I hope it will work as it should. I need a new dex

Author: Slyris#2880
Content:
I have a user experience on the latest version of atomicDex that bothers me. I start creating an order, I start filling the order, I go back to my home screen on my phone, and then go back to the application. And here the order I had begun to fill is completely erased. it would be nice if the data of an order being created is persistent

All simply when we put the application in background, we lose the data we were entering.

May be this is already reported

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: (Android)

Author: ferjr90#9314
Content: @hastrup AtomicDEX doesn't substract fees automatically. So you need to trade a lower amount to pay the fees with the remainings.

Author: ferjr90#9314
Content: @Slyris Try to disable energy saving for AtomicDEX in your Android configuration.

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: You mean to remove the restriction activity in the background ?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: No it's true, on losing focus it does not keep already entered information, power saving has nothing to do with that

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: It may be a fast fix, but it's not user friendly. I think the customer expects behavior persist by default

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: Also asking for the fingerprint every time we come back from the background, I think it's a little intrusive. But it's only my opinion.

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: I mean i put the application in background 20 seconds to answer a message for example

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: well that's same with PIN, but yeah it could have a delay

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: set session time or something

Author: Slyris#2880
Content: Yeah can be usefull

Content: plz make an issue

Content: Ok !
